namuth dan atham aayathana mulu sewaka sankhyawen wadi pirisak me kramayata aragena labha ipayime karyaka niyali sitina athara sewaka ayithinda kappadu kara athayi pawasiya.samahara aayathana minis bala samagam mangin sewakayan aragena labha upaya widesha samagam sathutu kirime wadasatahan da kriyathmaka wana bawin sama samagamakama anumatha sewaka pramana poronduwu paridi randawa sitinawada yanna soya balimata pasuwiparamak dan kriyathmaka wena athara paudgalika anshaya itha bahula lesa karana man pawar samagam walin sewakayan ganima dan rajya anshaye atham aayathanada karagena yana aakarayak daknata thibe.ebawin wruththiya anathuru ha ledarogawalin sewakayan rakaganimata nithi sakas karanawasema sewakayage rakiyawa aaraksha karadimata dan awadhanaya yomuwi athayi ee mahatha kiweya.eda biyaguluwi niweswalatawi siti aya dan eliyata pamina kagasanne udghoshana karanne janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha labadun nidahasa hethuwenya.
